battery-life_ipod_nano_8gb: Battery life seems to be good .
Battery Life  I bought this ipod to replace my 2nd gen 2gb ipod nano, because i filled that one's memory up .
Battery life is short  Received as a Christmas gift .
gas_mileage_toyota_camry_2007: I would not have purchased this vehicle if I was aware of the actual poor mileage .
The engine, ride and gas mileage is great .
room_holiday_inn_london: Other than that, our stay was uneventful and the room was clean, if a bit small .
Room was an Executive Club floor room and was larger than average for a London Holiday Inn, well laid out and everything worked !
The room was nice size with a small but adequate bathroom .
location_holiday_inn_london: Overall good hotel and very good location close to the tube   .
The location of the hotel is really good .
staff_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: The staff were very friendly and helpful during our stay .
Hotel staff was friendly and helpful .
The staff was great, all the way around, helpful and polite .
voice_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: The voice prompts  are mostly clear, sometimes quirky and the volume levels adequate .

The text to speech is great for not having to look down at the screen endangering yourself and others on the road and after the voice updates the Garmin put out for the 255W the scratchiness and robotic sounding voice became crisp and very audible .
The default voice is extremely clear and easy to understand, so I never even tried any of the alternative voices .
speed_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: Lastly  , you can immediately see the speed limit for every road you are on .
I liked the way it tells you the speed limit and how fast you are going .
,  The speed limit sign on the display is handy but in the first week of using the GPS I found it had the wrong speed limit a couple times .
size_asus_netbook_1005ha: keyboard is actually a pleasure to use inspite of small size
You should understand that this is not a full featured laptop squeezed into a smaller and manageable size .

The small size makes it very easy to carry compared to a standard laptop, the long battery life is really great, and the speed and performance using various wi, fi connections was better than I expected it to be   .
screen_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: The screen is large so that it is easily read while you're driving .
and zoom out   buttons on the 255w to the same side of the screen which makes it a bit easier .
Screen is clear and maps are pretty easy to follow .
battery-life_amazon_kindle: Plus the Kindle 2's Battery life is 4 days longer per charge .
Oh and one more thing ,  I've discovered that if you turn of  wifi    until you know you need to send or retrieve something, the battery lasts for many many more hours .
satellite_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: It also finds the satellite quickly .
The unit takes very quickly locks on to satellite signals, tracks very well and when you miss a turn or do something unexpected, recalculates a new route very quickly .
It takes a little while to get the satellites sometimes, but I just set it up as soon as I get in the car and by the time I'm out on the road and actually need directions it's up and going .
battery-life_netbook_1005ha: The main selling point for this netbook is its amazing battery life .
Battery life is great and it seems to charge fast as well .
keyboard_netbook_1005ha: The keyboard, though slightly smaller than standard, is a pleasure to use .
The keyboard is quite nice and I have very large hands and I make a lot fewer mistakes .
The keyboard is great and the screen looks good .
service_swissotel_hotel_chicago: Service was excellent and the suites were large and comfortable .
The room service was a little expensive but very good .
video_ipod_nano_8gb: The video capability is incredible, and so easy to use .
NOTHING  Ipod nano has a VIDEO CAMERA it is so cool, ROCK
As for the video camera it's a nice addition considering it's an mp3 player first and foremost, I think people are going to go into this and think maybe I can replace my old video, NO .
performance_netbook_1005ha: As for the performance of this little computer, I've gotta tell ya :
I'm actually downgrading in performance in getting this netbook but the performance lost is made up with the smaller form factor and greatly increased battery life .
I find that the performance is great for my use on just 1GB that comes with it .
service_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: The service in the hotel was really good .
Found the food there to be quite nice, and our service was always prompt and efficient .
The service is always great and the rooms very clean .
food_holiday_inn_london: The food was excellent, the service was very friendly and the prices cheap .
I can't comment on any of the hotel restaurants or food as we never ate there with so many other choices nearby .
The best food deal in this area is the local grocery store down the street ,  get your breakfast and lunch here and dine out nightly .
comfort_honda_accord_2008: It is comfortable, easy to drive, and fast !
I like my Accord very much, but had I known the drivers seat was so uncomfortable I would have never bought it .
This is by far the most comfortable vehicle I have owned .
updates_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: Another big name site did the same thing and told me that I would have to pay Garmin to update to the latest maps .
,  Speed of map updates is awesome .
Once receiving the unit, you get one map update download which must be used within 60 days .
staff_swissotel_chicago: The staff was very friendly and helpful .
The staff was polite and helpful .
features_windows7: But that aside, I like the availability of software, the new features like the improved Taskbar, Windows Peek, and the Aero environment .
What I will highlight are a few features of Windows 7 which I have been thoroughly impressed with .
Does the new operating system have cool features ?
interior_toyota_camry_2007: Interior is very nice and much improved .
Fit and finish are exquisite, the interior is extremely well designed, looks good, fun to drive .
The interior is stylish, roomy and has many nice features .
transmission_toyota_camry_2007: The transmission is  driving  me crazy .
It has major transmission issues, which I have had fixed twice .
I hate the transmission as it always hesitates to downshift when the power and speed is needed .
sound_ipod_nano_8gb: sound quality is awesome, easy to load, easy to use  .
and the sound and quality is great !
The sound quality is good, and
screen_ipod_nano_8gb: Good features, small and light weight but a big screen .
what i also like is that it has a bigger screen than the regular ipod nano .
buttons_amazon_kindle: The buttons are placed in a convenient area without being in the way, yet turning a page is a breeze .
significant improvement over Kindle 1's non intuitive forward and previous buttons .
The buttons really are much better .
service_holiday_inn_london: Service was great and the location of the hotel was very convenient   .
Good room poor service all round .
I ordered room service one night, and the food was delightful, and the service was fast and friendly .
price_holiday_inn_london: All in all, it was a decent hotel, but I think I may try somewhere else next time purely just to see what else is available at the same kind of price .
It's nicer than certain other hotels you'd get in the same price range on Priceline and all in all was nice .
seats_honda_accord_2008: Seats are very comfortable and ride is very smooth !
Seats are too firm and leather is quite  hard  in character and feel .
rooms_swissotel_chicago: The rooms were very clean and spacious .
The rooms are very nice , the location is excellent, but the service is Terrible !
Rooms were good, nothing spectacular about them except the views .
bathroom_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: Bathroom was spacious too and very clean .
The room was quite small but perfectly formed with a super bathroom .
The room was very nice, and had a nice bathroom .
food_swissotel_chicago: The food in the lounge was great and very fresh, , , salads, sandwiches etc .
Room service food quality was very good but with a $7 tray charge plus 20% service, I then absolutely refuse to tip for delivery .
We passed on the restaurants simply because the cost of breakfast was insane and the food tends to be mediocre .
accuracy_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: This is a great GPS, it is so easy to use and it is always accurate .
Accuracy is as good as any other unit, they all sometimes tell you you have arrived when you haven't, or continue to tell you to turn when you're already there .
Very easy to operate and pretty accurate as well, only led me astray once and that was in northern Maine where roads are few and paved ones fewer .
directions_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: Directions and maps are easy to use, and if you miss a turn, it updates your route in seconds .
I like how the Garmin 255W doesn't make you type in complete directions when it isn't necessary .
The directions were pretty right on, with a brief glitch with the distance it was calculating for some approaching streets .
mileage_honda_accord_2008: Gas mileage not quite as good as advertised .
Gas mileage is fantastic especially going from a V8 SUV to a 4 cylinder sedan   .
Don't buy this car if you want good gas mileage .
eyesight-issues_amazon_kindle: I have an  eye issue  and noticed it was getting harder to read books .
The screen is so easy on the eyes .
It's lightweight and allows changes in font size that enables ease of reading no matter how tired your eyes may get .
screen_netbook_1005ha: Screen is nice, and adequately sized, , use fullscreen browsing .
My only complaint with it is that the screen doesn't go back far enough .
The screen is small, only 1024 x 600 .
navigation_amazon_kindle: Once I got used to it, the navigation was easy too .
This ease of navigation is one of the most compelling new features of Kindle 2 for me .
>> Far better navigation between articles in periodicals, and easier navigation overall with its five, way controller replacing the K1's clumsy and time, consuming navigation wheel and cursor
location_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: Great location for Fisherman's Wharf and a hotel with a homely, personal touch .
If you are looking for a great location, I would recommend this hotel .
speed_windows7: It is as fast as Vista if not faster .
It loads blazing fast, software runs smooth and even downloads from the internet seem to be faster .
Also, in my non, benchmarked experience, Windows 7 has been at least as fast as XP if not faster .
price_amazon_kindle: I had been wanting a Kindle but had balked at getting one because of the price, but after our last move and packing up all of our books, and giving many away I was more open to the idea .
Amazons book are priced significantly lower and easier to find in my opinion .
The difference between the books I've purchased and the price of the Kindle is about $166 .
quality_toyota_camry_2007: While I love the design, the poor components, sub, par fit, and, finish, poor quality control, and unreliable work on the part of dealership techs will make me question the quality of any future Toyota vehicle .
I just feel the car is quality throughout .
Overall a good car, no build quality issues yet .
comfort_toyota_camry_2007: Comfort is great, mileage is good overall, better on the road than expected  , compared to my 1999 Camry .
It is a very comfortable car that gives us options that we never had on previous vehicles .
fonts_amazon_kindle: it's just like reading a paper book, but BETTER because you can increase the font size !
And with the Kindle, I can adjust the font to any of six different sizes, which is of some importance to those with poor vision or tired eyes .
The font sizes are easy to switch between and very usable .
interior_honda_accord_2008: Interior is nice but not as comfortable as past Accords and feels a little cheap .
The interior and exterior look great !
The interior design is roomy and very comfortable .
rooms_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: Rooms were a bit small but very clean and nicely maintained .
The rooms are very clean, spacious and quiet   .
the rooms are small but very nice .
performance_honda_accord_2008: The car is great, both with styling and performance .
I have owned 4 honda's and have come to rely on the fantastic quality of performance and lack of maintenance issues .
The performance of the engine is very smooth .
display_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: Display is excellent ,  the layout of information on the screen is very good showing upcoming turns at the top, your speed, the local speed limit and the estimated time of arrival at the bottom .
I have checked the display in three areas I am familiar with :
The new speed limit display on the 205 255 is quite helpful .
free_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: The free morning coffee and evening wine reception were both good opportunities to meet other guests .
Another great thing about the hotel is that every day, they offer wine and beer from 5, 6pm for free for all hotel guests .
Best feature was the freebie drinks in reception from 5, 6pm .
parking_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: However, parking is $30 night and valet only, which becomes a pain .
Parking was expensive but I think this is common for San Fran .
As far as parking is concerned, we were shell, shocked at what most of the hotels charge for parkingup to $40 night .
